item.title: The U.S. Is A Republic Not A Democracy
item.description: The U.S. is a republic. The word “Democracy” has never appeared in the Declaration of Independence and the Constitution.

item.title: A Harvard Student's Speech Praised By Public, But Not By Her Alum
item.description: Hope to make this kind of student majority? Volunteer, Donate, Vote!
